short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a shortcut to group current tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Press 'Ctrl+G' to group current tab.
- Group multiple tabs, by selecting tabs pressing 'Ctrl' or 'Shift'.
- Ungroup, or combine tab into group with same shortcut.
- Force toggle with 'Ctrl+Q' command.

Click on extension icon to open description page.

v1.2
- disabled description page showing up every time chrome updates.
- changed description page font size to not crash at windows.

v1.1
- added description page. click on extension icon to open.
- force toggle with 'Ctrl+Q' command.
- turning 'Ctrl+Q' command off is available at Options page.
